theScribe:StarterRelic1.NAME: Spell Scribe's Scroll
theScribe:StarterRelic1.FLAVOR: Inscribed with an "S" it radiates arcane energies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

theScribe:StarterRelic2.NAME: Spell Scribe's Pen
theScribe:StarterRelic2.FLAVOR: A fountain pen that never runs out of ink. It aids in the creation of spells.
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds 1 Scribed Spell to your hand at the start of every odd turn. NL Scribed Spells are used for casting spells created with #yscribe:Spell_Effects and #yscribe:Spell_Modifiers.

theScribe:OsmoticFilter.NAME: Osmotic Filter
theScribe:OsmoticFilter.FLAVOR: A mysterious device that is cool to touch and hums very slightly. It spouts crystal clear water that is refreshing to drink.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yscribe:Drained [REMOVE_SPACE], gain that much [E] at the start of your next turn.

theScribe:StormScale.NAME: Storm Scale
theScribe:StormScale.FLAVOR:
A tough and shiny scale. 
 Its innate ability to conduct electricity makes it a great foci for lightning-based spells.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would gain #yscribe:Spell_Effect [REMOVE_SPACE]: Damage, Increase it by #b1 for each card played this turn.

theScribe:PermafrostPen.NAME: Permafrost Pen
theScribe:PermafrostPen.FLAVOR:
An ice cold writing instrument, adorned with a snowflake. 
 Its chill numbs the nerves to pain.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that gives a #yscribe:Spell_Effect [REMOVE_SPACE], gain #b3 Block.

theScribe:AlchemicalAlter.NAME: Alchemical Alter
theScribe:AlchemicalAlter.FLAVOR: A flask of poison, supercharged with electricity. The potency of the toxin will shock you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would gain #yscribe:Spell_Effect [REMOVE_SPACE]: Damage, gain half of it as #ySpell #yEffect [REMOVE_SPACE]: #yPoison [REMOVE_SPACE].

theScribe:ClarityBossRelic.NAME: Invisible Inkwell
theScribe:ClarityBossRelic.FLAVOR:
An ornate Inkwell that spills forth an endless torrent of nothing. 
 You quickly lose track of spells scribed with this "ink".
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain " [REMOVE_SPACE]#ySpell #yEffect [REMOVE_SPACE]: Gain 1 [E] [REMOVE_SPACE]" at the start of each turn. At the end of each turn, lose all #yscribe:Spell_Effects and #yscribe:Spell_Modifiers [REMOVE_SPACE].

theScribe:RunicRepeater.NAME: Runic Repeater
theScribe:RunicRepeater.FLAVOR: A small metallic loop, adorned with strange letters. Wearing it seems to deepen your capacity for magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gaining a #yscribe:Spell_Modifier causes a random card in your hand to cost 1 less until end of turn.

theScribe:ScribeSkillbook.NAME: Scribe's Skillbook
theScribe:ScribeSkillbook.FLAVOR: This appears to be an introduction to modular spellcasting. The pages are worn from heavy use.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn costs 1 less.

theScribe:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.

theScribe:Skillbook.NAME: Multiclass Keyword
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards from the associated class may now spawn, and future Card Reward screens have #b1 additional card to choose from.
(You have disabled cardpool mixing in options) Future Card Reward screens have #b1 additional card to choose from.
